title: On Sale Skins not On Sale
body:
The new batch of skins, including Blood Moon Kennen and Academy Vladimir in the featured section, but not actually on Sale.
They also do not turn up when selecting 'on sale' under the skins section.

Just wanted to communicate this to Riot :)

replies.body: Hey yeah, per the [sales page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-1006-1009-0), they should be on sale now.  I'll pass on this information to see what's going on.  It's likely not updated yet to give players coming in late some wiggle room.  Sorry for the delay!
